TopicTitle: What was your best moment during KSP?

Articles.Content:
I want to hear your best achievement during KSP. I'll go first.

 

One day, about 2 years after i went to The Mun the first time, and crashed and spent the rest of the day crying, I was just sending a spaceship to high space above kerbin. If you drew a line between my target apoapsis, Kerbin, and Mun, it was about a 45 degree angle.

 

So after burning my stage to get to space high above Kerbin, I did my science and it said "High above the mun:, I was quite confused until I timewarped and unintentionally landed on the Mun perfectly, and in the process learned the Clock method of getting to the mun.

By "clock" you mean timing your leaving to meet up?

 

That one got me for a bit, too.

18 minutes ago, Mahnarch said:

By "clock" you mean timing your leaving to meet up?

 

That one got me for a bit, too.

Yeah
